BusinessAlertStatus.name: BusinessAlertStatus
BusinessAlertStatus.description: Represents information about the read status of an insight alert.

BusinessAlertId.description: The insight alert related to the status.

IsAlertRead.description: Indicates whether the insight alert is read by the user (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Specifies the activation status of the insight alert.

UserId.description: The ID of the user who is associated with the alert.
